text: Brigitte Morillo (born 28 June 1960) is an Ecuadorian equestrian. She competed in the individual dressage event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Ecuador Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Brigitte Morillo
